=== 2.1.0 ===
- Automatically send attempted transactions to the failure URL during active FYE downtimes
- Provide template for FYE downtime messaging (cashnet/cn_downtime.html)

=== 2.0.1 ===
- Bug fix in transaction simulation/test view for $0 amounts

=== 2.0.0 ===
- psu_base template reorg

=== 1.5.0 ===
- Updated to psu_base 5.0.0 for changes for latest Django version

=== 1.4.10 ===
- New function on Transaction to check if recoreded as likely successful

=== 1.4.9 ===
- Transaction list accepts overrideable template for related class/id
- Transaction detail accepts overrideable template for related class/id
- Update transaction status as AJAX or standard request

=== 1.4.7 ===
- Ignore missing transaction ID when processing response for Slackbot or Iframely
- Log as warning when failed transaction is missing transaction ID

=== 1.4.5 ===
- Ability for admins to update tx status without post-processing

=== 1.4.3 ===
- Increased cashnet message fields from 128 to 256
- Moved tx-status column next to the post-processing status column on the transaction list page

=== 1.4.2 ===
- Search for Recorded transactions
- Endpoint for unprocessed successful transactions
- Context processor containing cn_unprocessed (count of unprocessed transactions)

=== 1.4.0 ===
- Possible bug fix: Students sometimes get an error when returning from Cashnet, possibly due
  to SSO appending a pipe to the URL (/cashnet/tx/123|somegarbagecontent).  Now handling that; maybe.

=== 1.3.1 ===
- Automated code formatting
- Updated psu_base requirement
- Moved templates into a cashnet directory
- Allow AJAX updating of catalog item properties

=== 1.3.0 ===
- Define roles in __init__ for consistent use across app features
- Added info to admin email when transaction not found in db

=== 1.2.3 ===
- Shortened dynamic role syntax

=== 1.2.2 ===
- Export all models when psu_export is installed (for BI/Cognos export)
- Suppress duplicate error logging when tx not found

=== 1.2.1 ===
- Treat catalog items less than $1 as a percentage of the other items

=== 1.1.0 ===
- Replace CASHNET_ADMIN_EMAILS setting with emails from users with 'cashnet' authority

=== 1.0.7 ===
- Fixed bug in email to Cashnet admins on tx with error

=== 1.0.6 ===
- Cashnet's POST cannot pass Django's CSRF check, so it is now disabled for the Cashnet Response view

=== 0.9.1 ===
- Link to Train site from Fake site (in stage)
- Cashnet_service function to start a transaction query
- Test transaction form now includes a respmessage every time rather than user-entered

=== 0.9.0 ===
- Updated psu-base for secondary sorting on paginated results

=== 0.8.9 ===
- template tag for linking admins to transactions with errors

=== 0.8.8 ===
- Bugfix: Redirect was not being returned on error

=== 0.8.7 ===
- Function in cashnet_service to get transaction by ID

=== 0.8.6 ===
- Accommodate item quantities at transaction creation

=== 0.7.0 ===
- Revised cashnet response workflow to initially not use authentication
- Created a way for admins to mark incomplete transactions as S or F

=== 0.6.1 ===
- Initial Release
